name: Deťom s rakovinou n.o.
goal:
Our main goal is to build a top pediatric oncology clinic in Slovakia. To improve the conditions of treatment. We want the environment to be safe for children with cancer. We want to increase number of successfully treated children.
Other activities -
- raising childhood cancer awareness
- material support of clinics and families
- education of health care professionals
- art therapy
interests: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: Paediatric Medicines Regulation, communicating with public, medical professionals and other organisations about promoting research initiatives for childhood cancer.
